title: Dylan Sprouse gushes over Barbara Palvin in sweet dedication for her 26th birthday
text:
He's been dating her for a year.

And Dylan Sprouse took to Instagram to show how his love has grown for girlfriend Barbara Palvin on Tuesday in honor of her 26th birthday.

The 27-year-old Suite Life of Zack & Cody vet posted a photo of himself and Palvin sitting on the sidewalk and gazing into each other's eyes.

Sweet: Dylan Sprouse took to Instagram to show how his love has grown for girlfriend Barbara Palvin on Tuesday in honor of her 26th birthday

He began its caption by dubbing her with a definition: 'So I found a Japanese adjective that describes you and it’s Tsundere.

'It’s been a year and change since we started dating and even through moments of stress or hardship be it from life, career, or society, you’ve gotten warmer and friendlier and lovelier every time I see you again.'

He also enclosed a screenshot of the definition of 'tsundere' alongside the photo of the two of them that included a photo of a female anime character.

Defined: He also enclosed a screenshot of the definition of 'tsundere' alongside the photo of the two of them that included a photo of a female anime character

Sprouse went on in awe of how his lady love has evolved over the past year.

He added: 'Your strong Hungarian personality and mannerisms have developed into exactly what you intended them to be and I’m always in deep admiration at the way you can enact change into your world and yourself to become who you know you’re destined to be.

'I picked these photos because I know I always ruin them with my inability to take it seriously but you look fire in em anyways.

Posh: Sprouse went on in awe of how his lady love has evolved over the past year

'Happy birthday smoogie, I love you and thanks for being the 5 star Tsundere anime warrior GF I always needed.'

The two were acquainted after a chance meeting at a party and a subsequent slide from Sprouse into Palvin's direct messages on Instagram.

'He slid into my DMs,' Palvin recalled to W magazine back in February in a joint interview with Sprouse.

Smack! The two were acquainted after a chance meeting at a party and a subsequent slide from Sprouse into Palvin's direct messages on Instagram

Sprouse continued to the outlet: 'She followed me, so I was like, I guess I’ll give her something. And I slid into her DMs.'

'I was like, "Hey, I don’t know if you’re in New York for very long, but we should hang out if you want to. Here’s my number,"' he said.

Sprouse previously dated model Dayna Frazer for three years until they ended things in 2017.
description: He's been dating her for a year. And Dylan Sprouse took to Instagram to show how his love has grown for girlfriend Barbara Palvin on Tuesday in honor of her 26th birthday.
